item.title: Explain’AI Workshop - EGC 2025, Strasbourg
item.description: Co-organized the AI explainability workshop: planning, speaker selection, paper review and event facilitation in Strasbourg.

item.title: Design of the Educational Framework for the Bachelor's Program in AI, Biotech and Health
item.description: Curriculum defined through 4 ideation workshops, focusing on strategic directions and key competencies. Launch: Sept 2025.

item.title: ComSciCon 2024, Lyon – Organizing Team
item.description: Designed the program, selected activities and speakers, and secured funding for the science communication workshop.

item.title: Explain’AI Workshop - EGC 2024, Dijon
item.description: Co-organized a one-day event on AI explainability: speaker selection, paper review, and session moderation.

item.title: ComSciCon 2023, Nancy – Organizing Team
item.description: Led program design, selected speakers and coordinated logistics for the 2.5-day science communication workshop.

item.title: Scientific Game Jam 2023 – Scientific Mentor
item.description: Coached team scientists to effectively pitch their projects to the jury at the 48-hour game development event.

item.title: ComSciCon 2022, Marseille – Organizing Team
item.description: Supported logistics, candidate selection, and event coordination for this science communication workshop.
